parameters.definition: Total available design team hours per month
Total available engineering team hours per month

description: A company sells custom scooters and bikes for customers. The profit per scooter is \param{ProfitScooter} and the profit per bike is \param{ProfitBike}. Each product requires time with the design team and engineering team. Each scooter needs \param{DesignScooter} hours with the design team and \param{EngScooter} hours with the engineering team. Each bike needs \param{DesignBike} hours with the design team and \param{EngBike} hours with the engineering team. Per month, there are \param{TotalDesignHours} hours available on the design team and \param{TotalEngHours} hours available on the engineering team. How many of each should the company make per month to maximize profit?
